popup.abrHint: Modify MP3 conversion under "Settings → Strategy → Conversion Policy"
popup.popupLint: Click a resource and select its options

dashHint.name: About DASH / FLV / MP4
dashHint.desc: Don't change this unless necessary. Read {0} first.

error.selectLimit: Selecting more than 30 items is not recommended

updater.title: New version available!
updater.hint: You can disable "Auto Check Updates" under "Settings → General" (not recommended).

user.agree:

search.suggest: What would you like to search for?

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

clipboard.name: Clipboard Monitor
clipboard.desc: If enabled, automatically detect Bilibili links copied to the clipboard.

drag_search.name: Drag & Drop Monitor
drag_search.desc: If enabled, automatically search when Bilibili links are dragged into the app.

notify.name: Notifications
notify.desc: If enabled, send a system notification when a download finishes.

sidecar.name: Custom Executable Paths
sidecar.desc: Specify paths for external Sidecars. Requires correct permissions. Restart to apply.

auto_download.name: Auto Start Download
auto_download.desc: Start downloads automatically after adding tasks.

paths.name: Paths
paths.desc: "Temp Files" store unfinished downloads; processed files will be moved to "Output Files".

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: The database stores settings, login information, and download history.

database.name: Database
database.desc: Backup or restore the database here.

default.name: Default Parameters
default.desc: Used first during download. If unsupported, the highest available quality will be used.

max_conc.name: Max Concurrent Downloads
max_conc.desc: Controls how many tasks run simultaneously. Higher values may increase risk control.

speed_limit.name: Speed Limit
speed_limit.desc: KiB/s; set to 0 for unlimited. Takes effect after restart.

add_metadata.name: Embed Metadata into Video/Audio
add_metadata.desc: Automatically embed metadata when downloading video or audio files.

block_pcdn.name: Try Blocking PCDN
block_pcdn.desc: Prefer higher-quality links instead of PCDN.

danmaku.name: Convert XML Danmaku to ASS
danmaku.desc: Convert XML to ASS using DanmakuFactory.

mp3.name: Convert Audio to MP3
mp3.desc: Force audio files to be converted to MP3 (video+audio unaffected).

mp4.name: Convert Video to MP4
mp4.desc: Force video to MP4; the audio track will be converted to AAC.

naming.name: Naming Format
naming.desc:
Click to insert variables. Unsupported fields will be empty.
Time variables support {format}, e.g. {example}

info.title: About
info.paid: This is a free, public project. If you paid for this software, you may have been scammed.
info.star: If you find this project useful, please give it a Star on GitHub!
info.data: All persistent data is stored locally on your device.
